name: 蕭耀榮
objective:
古典控制複習、線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用

Review of Automatic Control, Linear control, state space, model and dynamic response, controllability, observability, state feedback, state estimation, controller design, observer design, MIMO systems
